ixia: A South African bulbous plant of the Iris family remarkable for the brilliancy of its flowers
ixodes: A genus of parasitic Acarina which includes various species of ticks See Tick the insect
ixodian: A tick of the genus Ixodes or the family Ixodid
ixtil: The fine soft fiber of the bromeliaceous plant Bromelia sylvestris
ixtle: A Mexican name for a variety of Agave rigida which furnishes a strong coarse fiber also the fiber itself which is called also pita and Tampico fiber Written also istle The fine soft fiber of the bromeliaceous plant Bromelia sylvestris
ixtli: A Mexican name for a variety of Agave rigida which furnishes a strong coarse fiber also the fiber itself which is called also pita and Tampico fiber Written also istle
